title: Next Generation TextTrackCue
summary: TextTrackCue enhancements for programmatic subtitle and caption presentation. We've been making progress since FOMS this past spring. Please see [our FOMS slides](https://www.icloud.com/keynote/0GJUbJwWfA2i77M2JysKjj45w#Generic_Text_Cue_-_FOMS_2019) for the basic idea
goals: Engage with browser engineers and media experts & gauge interest in pursuing this as new web API
